org.grails.datastore.mapping.proxy
[Java] Class GroovyObjectMethodHandler

java.lang.Object
  org.grails.datastore.mapping.proxy.GroovyObjectMethodHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
MethodHandler
public class GroovyObjectMethodHandler

Javassist MethodHandler for handling GroovyObject methods delegates getProperty, setProperty & invokeMethod to super class's MetaClass

Authors:
Lari Hotari
